sentences.sContent: A sentinel struck the rings of his carbine against his left hand.
sentences.sContent_eng: A sentinel struck the rings of his carbine against his left hand.
sentences.sCn: 一个哨兵把他的步枪拍的一声转到左手。

sentences.sContent: Cedar columns stand sentinel in the ceremony rooms, their quiet strength connecting the congregants to this heritage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cedar columns stand sentinel in the ceremony rooms, their quiet strength connecting the congregants to this heritage.
sentences.sCn: 雪松如列站在仪式室的哨兵，它们宁静庄严的气质将活动与场地联系在一起。

sentences.sContent: My mother tiptoed from their room to find me patiently waiting in the same spot she had left me, standing like a sentinel in the hallway.
sentences.sContent_eng: My mother tiptoed from their room to find me patiently waiting in the same spot she had left me, standing like a sentinel in the hallway.
sentences.sCn: 母亲从她们房间蹑手蹑脚地走出来，看到我耐心地等在原地，像个哨兵似的站在走廊上。
